page.title: 14CHURCH LAWTON COUNCILLOR
page.content: I interviewed Councillor Plant about his work as Chairman of Church Lawton Parish Council. He was asked to involve himself in Parish Council work, because of his connection with the P.T.A and Village Hall Committees. He has been Chairman for the last 13 years, and receives no payment for this work. He receives much pleasure from his various activities, in seeing all organisations working together for the Village Fete. All this work gives little time for relaxation. As to the future he would like better playing fields, including an Amenity Centre where the council Depot yard is now situated. Also a litter free village would be desirable to the whole community.
